name: Day One No Rest Blast
description: All around workout with no rest between exercises, focusing on strength and endurance

workouts.name: High knees
workouts.description: Stand in place and run, bringing knees up to waist level

workouts.name: Squats
workouts.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower body as if sitting in a chair

workouts.name: Sit ups
workouts.description: Lie on your back with knees bent, lift upper body towards knees

workouts.name: Mountain Climbers
workouts.description: Start in a plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest quickly

workouts.name: Elbows to hands plank
workouts.description: Start in a plank position on elbows

workouts.name: Alternating lunges
workouts.description: From standing, step forward into a lunge, alternating legs

workouts.name: Dips
workouts.description: Use a chair or bench, lower body by bending elbows, then push back up

workouts.name: Burpees
workouts.description: From standing, drop into a squat, kick feet back into a plank, return to squat, and jump up

workouts.name: Leg Raise Circles
workouts.description: Lie on your back, lift legs to 90 degrees, and make small circles
